short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit to Hacker News by clicking on the extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick way to submit a website to Hacker News at https://news.ycombinator.com

If you're already logged in on Hacker News, clicking on the extension icon redirects to the Hacker News submit page with the title and the URL filled in.
